      • enquiry

        public Prize enquiry(Context<?> respCtx,
            BaseTicket clientTicket)
              throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: PrizeService
        Enquiry the prize of a ticket. A ticket may win both normal and sencond chance prize, the implementation must calculate both of them.

        Pre-Condition

        • The sold draw must be 'payout started'.
        Post-Condition
        • A successful call to this interface will return both normal and second chance prize information.
        Usage-Restriction
        • Authorization - Can only be called by signed in clients.
        • Concurrent Access - There isn't any limitation on the number of concurrent access of this interface. The service is indempotent and won't change any states.
        Only when game draw is 'PAYOUT STARTED', the enquiry can get the prize response. To multlple-draw ticket, all 'PAYOUT STARTED' game draw should be calculated, the other game draw(not 'payout started', such as 'new', \ 'active', 'result entered' etc) should be regarded as 'return'.
        指定者:
        enquiry 在接口中 PrizeService
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of transaction.
        clientTicket - The ticket which is claiming prize. The following components must not be null: serialNo.
        返回:
        both normal and second chance prize information.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • payout

        public Prize payout(Context<?> respCtx,
           BaseTicket clientTicket)
             throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: PrizeService
        This operation will pay for winning ticket. One ticket can be paid only once, and operator will collect the winning ticket after payout. To a multiple-draw ticket, there will be multiple tickets records, also one ticket record will has one corresponding 'PAYOUT' record if this ticket record wines a prize(even return is a payout).

        This operator will call PrizeService.enquiry(Context, BaseTicket) to get prize information first.

        Let's say there are a 3-draws ticket, in which ticket#1 associate draw#1(payout started), and ticket#2 associates with draw#2 which is active(or now, it doesn't matter).

        TicketID LottoTicket SerialNO LottoTicket Status Is Count In Pool Game Instance ID GameInstance Status
        t1 SN-OLD accepted true d1 payout started
        t2 SN-OLD accepted true d2 active
        t3 SN-OLD accepted true d3 new

        Print New LottoTicket Mode

        After payout, only tickets belong to a payout-started game draw will be set as 'paid'(here is t1), all other ticket records will be remained as 'accepted' and count_in_pool.

        Also new tickets will be generated for those tickets in future game instances, here they are t2 and t3.

        TicketID LottoTicket SerialNo LottoTicket Status Is Count In Pool Game Instance ID GameInstance Status
        t1 SN-OLD paid true d1 payout started
        t2 SN-OLD accepted true d2 active
        t3 SN-OLD accepted true d3 new
        t4 SN-NEW accepted true d2 active
        t5 SN-NEW accepted true d3 new
        And the log of new printed ticket will be:
        ID SerialNo of OldTicket SerialNO of NewTicket Status
        1 SN-OLD SN-NEW unconfirmed
        And payout entity will be:
        ID LottoTicket SN Game Instance Type Status
        P1 SN-OLD d1 Winning Paid

        Then a 'confrim refund' request should be issued by client, when got this request, TE can be very sure that client has handled the 'payout' response successfully. After confirmation, the status will be:

        TicketID LottoTicket SerialNo LottoTicket Status Is Count In Pool Game Instance ID GameInstance Status
        t1 SN-OLD paid true d1 payout started
        t2 SN-OLD invalid false d2 active
        t3 SN-OLD invalid false d3 new
        t4 SN-NEW accepted true d2 active
        t5 SN-NEW accepted true d3 new
        And the log of new printed ticket will be:
        ID SerialNo of OldTicket SerialNO of NewTicket Status
        1 SN-OLD SN-NEW confirmed

        If POS issue a reversal request instead of 'payout confirm', then after reversal:

        TicketID LottoTicket SerialNo LottoTicket Status Is Count In Pool Game Instance ID GameInstance Status
        t1 SN-OLD paid true d1 payout started
        t2 SN-OLD accepted true d2 active
        t3 SN-OLD accepted true d3 new
        t4 SN-NEW invalid false d2 active
        t5 SN-NEW invalid false d3 new
        And the log of new printed ticket will be:
        ID SerialNo of OldTicket SerialNO of NewTicket Status
        1 SN-OLD SN-NEW invalid
        And one payout entity will be generated:
        ID LottoTicket SN Game Instance Type Status
        P1 SN-OLD d1 Winning Reversed
        If it is a single draw ticket, 'payout confirm' can be simply ignored.

        Refund Mode

        After payout, the ticket's status will be:
        TicketID LottoTicket SerialNo LottoTicket Status Is Count In Pool Game Instance ID GameInstance Status
        t1 SN-OLD paid true d1 payout started
        t2 SN-OLD returned true d2 active
        t3 SN-OLD returned true d3 new
        And 3 payout entities will be generated:
        ID LottoTicket SN Game Instance Type Status
        P1 SN-OLD d1 Winning Paid
        P2 SN-OLD d2 Return Paid
        P3 SN-OLD d3 Return Paid
        In this case, 'payout confirmation' will be ignored.

        Pre-Condition

        • The sold draw must be 'payout started'
        • The status of ticket(ticket record associate with sold draw) must be 'accepted'.
        • Current time doesn't exceed last payout claim time.
        • The PIN must be matched if client needs to input PIN.

        Post-Condition

        • Log the payout transaction.
        • Update the ticket record of 'payout started' draw as 'paid'
        • Generate 'NEW_PRIZE_TICKET' record(unconfirmed) if payout mode is 'print new ticket'.
        • Generate 'TE_TICKET' from original winning ticket with a different serialNo, and status is 'accepted') if payout mode is 'print new ticket'.
        • Generate 'PAYOUT' for each winning ticket record(type is winning, and only cash prize will be counted in prize amount and tax amount, etc)
        • generate a return 'PAYOUT' if there are some unclaimed game instance and payout mode is 'refund'.
        • Generate 'PAYOUT_DETAIL' for both cash and object prize.
        • Retore merchant's credit level by actual amount.

        Usage Restriction

        • Authorization - Can only be called by signed in user.
        • Concurrent Access - To a single device, this interface must be called sequentially. To multiple devices, there are no limitation on the number of concurrent accesses.
        指定者:
        payout 在接口中 PrizeService
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of transaction.
        clientTicket - The payout request. The following components of LottoTicket argument must not be null: serialNo,PIN(if the backend ask to verify PIN), inputChannel.
        返回:
        the payout result.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • confirmPayout

        public void confirmPayout(Context<?> respCtx,
                 BaseTicket clientTicket)
                   throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: PrizeService
        Why we need payout confirmation??? The main goal of this transaction is to guarantee that all sale tickets will join winning analysis. If customer buy a multiple-draw ticket, and this ticket win a prize. when customer go to merchant to claim prize, merchant will do payout for all finished game draw, and do refund for all future game draw. If payout mode is 'print new ticket', there is possibility that 'conform' request can not reach TE. Does how TE handle this situation? If no confirm request reaches TE, client maybe encounter below 2 situations:
        • A: client has printed new ticket, and paid cash to customer
        • B: client didn't print new ticket, returned old physical ticket to customer.
        At TE, due to no confirm request received, both old tickets and new printed tickets are valid, they will both join winning analysis. Ultimately, either old or new printed tickets should be think as company absorption. To situation A, customer has got prize and new printed ticket, he/she just thought the payout has finished successfully. Later he/she will maybe come back to claim prize with new printed tickets. So in this case, TE should think old tickets as company absorption. To situation B, customer didn't got prize, he/she will get back the old tickets, so TE should think new printed tickets as company absorption.
        指定者:
        confirmPayout 在接口中 PrizeService
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
        另请参阅:
        PrizeService.payout(Context, BaseTicket)

      • assemblePrize

        protected Prize assemblePrize(java.util.List<ExtraBallTicket> dbTickets,
                  ExtraBallTicket physicalTicket,
                  boolean isPayout)
                       throws ApplicationException
        Assemble PrizeDto instance from ticket.serialNo. Below precondition must be satisfied:
        1. The ticket exists
        2. At least the buying gamedraw is 'payout started', customer can go to claim prize at any time. To multiple-draw ticket, some later gamedraws maybe not 'payout started'
        The prize will be assembled from WinningItems.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

                                                throws ApplicationException
        Handle each winning item, and calculate tax if needed.
        返回:
        the prize item of a single game instance.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
